_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CATENTTYPE_ID CHAR(16), PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT CATENTRY_ID, CATENTTYPE_ID FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY q.CATENTRY_ID) AS rn, q.* from (select distinct CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID, CATENTRY.CATENTTYPE_ID FROM CATENTRY, CATGPENREL WHERE CATENTRY.MARKFORDELETE=0 AND CATENTRY.CATENTRY_ID=CATGPENREL.CATENTRY_ID AND CATGPENREL.CATALOG_ID=#MASTER_CATALOG_ID#) q ) WHERE rn BETWEEN ?start_value? AND ?end_value?

_config:table.definition: CREATE TABLE TI_CEPCHILD_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# (CATENTRY_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (CATENTRY_ID))
_config:table.name: TI_CEPCHILD_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG#

_config:query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT CATENTRY_ID_CHILD CATENTRY_ID FROM CATENTREL CEREL, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE WHERE CEREL.CATRELTYPE_ID NOT IN ('PRODUCT_ITEM') AND CEREL.CATENTRY_ID_PARENT=CE.CATENTRY_ID UNION (SELECT DISTINCT DKLIST.CATENTRY_ID CATENTRY_ID FROM DKPDCCOMPLIST DKLIST, DKPDCCATENTREL DKCEREL, TI_CATENTRY_#INDEX_SCOPE_TAG# CE WHERE DKCEREL.DKPREDEFCONF_ID=DKLIST.DKPREDEFCONF_ID AND DKCEREL.CATENTRY_ID=CE.CATENTRY_ID AND CE.CATENTTYPE_ID='DynamicKitBean')
